meanings.sent1: The bear looked corpulent after eating all the honey.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised the patient to exercise regularly to avoid becoming corpulent.
meanings.sent3: The corpulent cat struggled to fit through the small cat door.
meanings.sent4: The corpulent clouds in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The corpulent man had to buy new clothes because his old ones no longer fit.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: The king was known for his corpulent appearance.
meanings.sent2: The corpulent at the party enjoyed the buffet a bit too much.
meanings.sent3: The corpulent won the pie-eating contest with ease.
meanings.sent4: The corpulent of the group always brought snacks to share.
meanings.sent5: The corpulent in the mirror made her realize it was time to start eating healthier.
